channel.title: Invisible character after equipt
channel.description: I am currently having this problem with my customs i'm trying to add to my client, whenever I wield all of them at once they will make me invisible but when i wear certain ones they show fine. Help is appreciated and ill rep. [img]http://im.ezgif.com/tmp/ezgif-2187620176.gif[/img]

item.title: Invisible character after equipt
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Typically, your character goes invisible because of one of two things:

  1. The model isn’t in the client, so it’s attempting to display nothing…

  2. There’s too many models/polygons/triangles (Not 100% which) on the character. This causes them to “flicker”.

To me, it sounds like your issue is #1. So make sure you have the male and female wield models in your Raw folder, or models folder, or in whatever folder you use to load models. Or if you use Galkon’s index repacking, make sure the models are in gzip format and are in the index1 folder.

Read full topic
